sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04

sentences.sentence: We have decided to invite the Argentine Republic, the Arab Republic of Egypt, the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, the Islamic Republic of Iran, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and the United Arab Emirates to become full members of BRICS the membership will take effect from the 1st of January 2024.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The discharge is considered a necessary step towards decommissioning the plant, which was destroyed by a tsunami in 2011.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Japanese government was given the green light by the UN nuclear watchdog, which says the water was treated and safe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: A survey found that 80% of respondents opposed the Japanese plan, while 60% said they wouldn't eat seafood after the water release began. The Chinese government has called the spill an act of selfishness and has banned all imports of Japanese seafood without ruling out further measures to safeguard food safety for the public.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: She was convicted of preying on two underage girls between 2004 and 2007. Liefer fled to her native Israel in 2008 after a victim came forward and was extradited in 2021 to stand trial in Melbourne.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
